alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 4:25AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern West Feliciana, West Baton Rouge, southeastern Pointe Coupee, southwestern East Feliciana, north central Iberville and western East Baton Rouge Parishes through 515 AM CDT... At 424 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Zachary, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Zachary, Baker, Port Allen, Oak Hills Place, Addis, Brusly, Slaughter, Grosse Tete, Westminster, Merrydale, Erwinville, Gardere, Brownfields and Baton Rouge Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 141 and 162. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 2. Interstate 110 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge; West Feliciana
